enpointHost.fieldDescription: The Marketo REST API Endpont host, found in Marketo under Admin >> Integration >> Web Services. Example: https://1234.mktorest.com
enpointHost.name: ./endpointHost

serverInstance.fieldDescription: URL Used to access marketo, e.g. //app-ab3123.marketo.com
serverInstance.name: ./serverInstance

munchkinId.fieldDescription: Found in Marketo under Admin >> Integration >> Munchkin
munchkinId.name: ./munchkinId

clientId.fieldDescription: Found in Marketo under Admin >> Integration >> LaunchPoint
clientId.name: ./clientId

clientSecret.fieldDescription: Found in Marketo under Admin >> Integration >> LaunchPoint
clientSecret.name: ./clientSecret
